name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GridMaster with Pixel Ruler and Crop

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple grid line ruler with pixel rulers and cropping functionality to help place content on a webpage in a straight line.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GridMaster is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension designed to help web designers, developers, and anyone who works with web content to place elements on a webpage in a perfectly straight line. With pixel rulers, customizable grid lines, and a cropping tool, GridMaster makes it easy to ensure precision in your designs.

Key Features:

Grid Lines: Add horizontal and vertical grid lines to your webpage for easy alignment of content.

Pixel Rulers: Measure dimensions and distances accurately with rulers at the top and side of the viewport.

Full-Page Grid: Toggle a full-page grid overlay to see your content's layout at a glance.

Cropping Tool: Easily measure specific areas on the webpage with a crop box that shows pixel dimensions.

Whether you're a web designer looking to align elements perfectly or a developer needing precise measurements, GridMaster is the tool for you.
